title: Exzellent Erklärt auf LinkedIn: Unser Immunsystem - Von Entzündungen, Impfung und Mikroplastik
description: Wer steckt eigentlich hinter #exzellenterklaert? Seit Dezember 2020 sitzen #Wissenschaftskommunikator:innen von 10 #Exzellenzcluster|n zusammen und realisieren…
text:
[](https://www.linkedin.com/company/exzellent-erklaert?trk=public_post_feed-actor-image)
156 Follower:innen
Wer steckt eigentlich hinter
[#exzellenterklaert](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fexzellenterklaert&trk=public_post-text)? Seit Dezember 2020 sitzen [#Wissenschaftskommunikator](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fwissenschaftskommunikator&trk=public_post-text):innen von 10 [#Exzellenzcluster](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fexzellenzcluster&trk=public_post-text)|n zusammen und realisieren seither den [#Wissenschaftspodcast](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fwissenschaftspodcast&trk=public_post-text) [Exzellent Erklärt](https://www.linkedin.com/company/exzellent-erklaert?trk=public_post-text)! Im September 2021 ging endlich die erste Folge an den Start und das gesamte Projektteam dankt allen Hörer:innen für das Interesse an [#Wissenschaft](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fwissenschaft&trk=public_post-text) und [#Wissenschaftskommunikation](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fwissenschaftskommunikation&trk=public_post-text)!
***Das Team***
Alena Gold von [Balance of the Microverse](https://de.linkedin.com/company/excellence-cluster-balance-of-the-microverse?trk=public_post-text)
Alexander Siebert von [Munich Cluster for Systems Neurology (SyNergy)](https://de.linkedin.com/company/synergy-cluster?trk=public_post-text)| jetzt [Trophic Communications](https://de.linkedin.com/company/trophic-communications?trk=public_post-text)
[Anna Euteneuer](https://de.linkedin.com/in/anna-euteneuer-4908b3bb?trk=public_post-text) von [CECAD Cologne](https://de.linkedin.com/company/cecad-cologne?trk=public_post-text) | jetzt [University of Cologne](https://de.linkedin.com/school/university-of-cologne/?trk=public_post-text)
[Anca Ionescu](https://de.linkedin.com/in/anca-maria-ionescu?trk=public_post-text) von [Munich Center for Quantum Science and Technology](https://de.linkedin.com/company/mcqst?trk=public_post-text)
[Antje Nestler](https://de.linkedin.com/in/antjenestler?trk=public_post-text) von [Matters of Activity. Image Space Material](https://de.linkedin.com/company/mattersofactivity?trk=public_post-text)
[Birgit Ziller](https://de.linkedin.com/in/birgit-ziller-31b696161?trk=public_post-text) von [e-conversion Cluster](https://de.linkedin.com/company/e-conversion-cluster?trk=public_post-text) | jetzt [Fraunhofer-Gesellschaft](https://de.linkedin.com/company/fraunhofer-gesellschaft?trk=public_post-text)
Doreen Böttcher von [CeTI](https://de.linkedin.com/company/centrefortactileinternet?trk=public_post-text)
[Dr. Elisabeth Jurack](https://de.linkedin.com/in/dr-elisabeth-jurack?trk=public_post-text) von [Cluster of Excellence ImmunoSensation - University of Bonn](https://de.linkedin.com/company/immunosensation?trk=public_post-text) | jetzt [The University of Bonn](https://de.linkedin.com/school/rheinische-friedrich-wilhelms-universit%C3%A4t-bonn/?trk=public_post-text)
[Sonja Smalian](https://de.linkedin.com/in/sonja-smalian-3673802a?trk=public_post-text) von [Cluster of Excellence PhoenixD: Photonics, Optics, and Engineering - Innovation Across Disciplines ](https://de.linkedin.com/company/phoenixd?trk=public_post-text)
[Renée Dillinger-Reiter](https://de.linkedin.com/in/ren%C3%A9e-dillinger-reiter-09723922b?trk=public_post-text) von [#Prisma](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fprisma&trk=public_post-text)+
und neu dazugekommen:
[Dr. Sabrina Rager](https://de.linkedin.com/in/dr-sabrina-rager-7531691a7?trk=public_post-text) von [e-conversion Cluster](https://de.linkedin.com/company/e-conversion-cluster?trk=public_post-text)
Die Exzellenzcluster werden gefördert von der [Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft (DFG) - German Research Foundation](https://de.linkedin.com/company/deutsche-forschungsgemeinschaft-dfg---german-research-foundation?trk=public_post-text)!
Und wenn Euch die Krankheitswelle in diesem Winter auch erreicht habt und ihr euch für das [#Immunsystem](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fimmunsystem&trk=public_post-text) interessiert, dann hört in Folge 23 "Unser Immunsystem – Von [#Entzündungen](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2FentzAeSndungen&trk=public_post-text), [#Impfung](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fimpfung&trk=public_post-text) und [#Mikroplastik](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fmikroplastik&trk=public_post-text)" von [Cluster of Excellence ImmunoSensation - University of Bonn](https://de.linkedin.com/company/immunosensation?trk=public_post-text) rein:
[https://lnkd.in/ecKKPGxc](https://lnkd.in/ecKKPGxc?trk=public_post-text)
[#innovation](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Finnovation&trk=public_post-text) [#university](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Funiversity&trk=public_post-text) [#communications](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fcommunications&trk=public_post-text) [#research](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fresearch&trk=public_post-text) [#scienceandtechnology](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fscienceandtechnology&trk=public_post-text) [#wisskomm](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fwisskomm&trk=public_post-text) [#scicomm](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fscicomm&trk=public_post-text) [#researchingermany](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fresearchingermany&trk=public_post-text) [#forschung](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fforschung&trk=public_post-text) [#forschungindeutschland](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fforschungindeutschland&trk=public_post-text)
